sentence.text: Defects of positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration, calcium- and integrin-binding protein 2, have been reported to cause isolated deafness, positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration and Usher syndrome type-IJ, characterized by congenital profound deafness, balance defects and blindness.

entity.text: positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration

sentence.text: We report here two new nonsense mutations (pGln12* and pTyr110*) in positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration patients displaying nonsyndromic profound hearing loss, with no evidence of vestibular or retinal dysfunction.
